data.pricing_trends: Prices for flights and hotels generally rise during holiday seasons, with clear fluctuations based on booking windows. Average flight costs from Europe range from $200 to $500 round trip in winter.
data.booking_windows: Optimal booking window is 2 to 4 months in advance for better deals. Last-minute bookings can be expensive due to high demand during holiday periods.
data.demand: Visible increase in demand during winter holiday seasons, particularly around Christmas and New Year. Off-peak months show lower interest but unique offerings.
data.competition: Alternative destinations for winter travel include Norway and Finland, but Iceland's unique landscape remains a strong draw to tourists.
